dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3828568U] From ICDSoft: Notification on infringement of copyright re

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3828568U] From ICDSoft: Notification on
infringement of copyright regarding wildthing.net.au /70.86.36.210/

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

<abuse@icdsoft.com>, uid 1004) with qmail-scanner-2.01  
 (clamdscan: 0.88.4/1784.    
 Clear:RC:1(213.145.98.15):.  
 Processed in 0.077665 secs); 12 Apr 2007 16:49:11 -0000 
Received: from unknown (HELO MAHAGON) (213.145.98.15) 
  by office.suresupport.com with SMTP; 12 Apr 2007 16:49:10 -0000 
Message-ID: <01f101c77d22$98eb0e50$8f118255@MAHAGON> 
From: "ICDSoft Abuse" <abuse@icdsoft.com> 
To: <legal@theplanet.com>, 
        <abuse@theplanet.com>, 
        <support@theplanet.com> 
Subject: From ICDSoft: Notification on infringement of copyright
regarding wildthing.net.au /70.86.36.210/ 
Date: Thu, 12 Apr 2007 19:49:18 +0300 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; 
        format=flowed; 
        charset="koi8-r"; 
        reply-type=original 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
X-Priority: 3 
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.3790.2663 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.3790.2757 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Apr 2007 16:49:20.0889 (UTC)
FILETIME=[84830E90:01C77D22] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sirs, 
 
 
 
Your company Theplanet.com appears to provide services to this website  
wildthing.net.au. This website "wildthing.net.au"
http://wildthing.net.au  
hereby referred to as "the infringing website") is currently infringing
on  
the copyright, held by ICDSoft Ltd. (hereby referred to as "the
complaining  
party"). 
 
 
 
The infringing website makes use of elements including, but not limited
to,  
graphical design elements, source code, texts, and graphical layout. The
web  
site "icdsoft.com" (infringed copyrighted work) contains the
aforementioned  
materials, which have been infringed. 
 
 
 
You are being notified in accordance with the DMCA act. To keep up to
your  
limitation of liability, you are hereby ordered to respond expeditiously
and  
to remove, or disable access to the material that is claimed to be  
infringing. This violation is notably against the DMCA act, and we will
not  
tolerate such infringement. If you have not removed or disabled the
access  
to the aforementioned copyrighted material from www.wildthing.net.au
website  
in accordance with our demand within 24 hours, we will take legal
actions  
against your company. These actions will be against any agent(s),  
organization(s) and/or people involved in the electronic distribution
within  
the network of Theplanet.com of the ICDSoft copyrighted material on the

wildthing.net.au website. 
 
 
 
This notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, the
complaining  
party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive right

that has been allegedly infringed. 
 
 
 
ICDSoft Ltd has the firm belief that the use of the material in the
above  
discussed manner was not authorized by the copyright owner or the law. 
 
 
 
We are looking forward to your response, and we, hereby, reserve all our

legal remedies in this matter. 
 
 
 
--  
 
Best Regards, 
 
Krassimir Vassilev 
 
Abuse Team 
 
ICDSoft.com
